  physical_appearance: This is a blue female undergarment. It is moon-shaped. Two strings are attached to either ends on the left and right. There are no tears or stains seen on the garment.

 Earl Ming-Teh

  subject_terms_4: 

  sgcool_label_text: This simple blue female undergarment belonged to a majie
 a Cantonese female domestic helper. The undergarment can be fastened with two strings and it was worn under the samfoo
 their traditional attire which consists of a white mandarin-collar top and black trousers.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a blue female undergarment. It is moon-shaped. Two strings are attached to either ends on the left and right. There are no tears or stains seen on the garment.
metadata.sgcool_label_text: This simple blue female undergarment belonged to a majie, a Cantonese female domestic helper. The undergarment can be fastened with two strings and it was worn under the samfoo, their traditional attire which consists of a white mandarin-collar top and black trousers.
